name: Halloween Car Parking Free
description: The ultimate car parking game with a Halloween twist! The object of the game is to drive through the haunted road in the dark midnight with amazing Halloween characters and park in the designated spot. Halloween Car Parking is trickier than it sounds. While driving the Halloween car avoid zombies and ghosts and finish the level as fast as you can. Levels have amazing Halloween scenery and get harder and harder to beat. Get ready to test all your driving skills with high quality sounds and great controls.
